action-definition.name: simple-workflow
action-definition.title: Add simple workflow to content
action-definition.description: This will add a simple workflow to the matched content. This will allow the content to be moved to a different space for its next step in a workflow. You can also give a space for it to be moved to if you want a reject step.

action-definition.name: link-category
action-definition.title: Link content to category
action-definition.description: This will apply a category to the matched content.

action-definition.name: add-features
action-definition.title: Add features to content
action-definition.description: This will add a feature to the matched content.

action-definition.name: copy
action-definition.title: Create a copy of content in a given format at a specific location
action-definition.description: This will copy the matched content to another location with a specific format.

action-definition.name: move
action-definition.title: Move content to a specific space
action-definition.description: This will move the matched content to another space.

action-definition.name: email
action-definition.title: Send an email to specified users
action-definition.description: This will send an email to a list of users when the content matches.

action-definition.name: check-in
action-definition.title: Check in content
action-definition.description: This will check in the matched content.

action-definition.name: check-out
action-definition.title: Check out content
action-definition.description: This will check out the matched content.

condition-definition.name: no-condition
condition-definition.title: All Content
condition-definition.description: This condition will match any item of content added to the space. Use this when you wish to apply an action to everything when it is added to the space.

condition-definition.name: in-category
condition-definition.title: Content in a specific category
condition-definition.description: The rule is applied to all content that has a specific category.

condition-definition.name: contains-text
condition-definition.title: Content which contains specific text in its name
condition-definition.description: The rule is applied to all content that has specific text in its name.
